description: This file is an HTML document that implements a web-based database visualizer interface. It contains the structure, styles, and scripts for browsing databases, tables, and viewing data. The JavaScript code handles fetching database info, tables, and data via API calls, and dynamically updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, updating the UI accordingly.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database entry to show or hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data from a specific table and renders it within the viewer.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs and displays the HTML table from data rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for each cell, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Enables expanding/collapsing cell content for wide or complex data.

search-terms: interactive table with wide content handling
